title: A Slippery Slope (CRE220)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In the twentieth episode of our second season, Steve Agee, Moshe Kasher and Kerri Doherty tell stories of times things got very slippery indeed.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Steve Agee, Moshe Kasher, Kerri Doherty, Kevin Allison, Robbie Seahag, Jeff Barr, The Republic Tigers, Dan Rosen, Julia Stone, Kakkmaddafakka Tortue Super Sonic, Revolution Void)
